hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $42$ and move **left** $\purpleD{10}$ and then $\maroonD{7}$ more.

This number line shows $42 - 17$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 32, and 42. From 42 an arrow goes to 32 with the label minus 10 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 32 to question mark with the label minus 7 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/35731a7d841161ec26160e9a6b07fe53fd9dcf27)
